about_the_game:
The picture quality is clear and the operation is smooth, allowing you to truly experience the fun of bow and arrow. There are no bloody scenes in the game, only tension and joy. In the simple mode, you can accurately kill according to the ballistic prompts. After you master the aiming skills, you can choose the difficult mode to experience the joy of aiming with your hands and eyes, which will bring you a more realistic feeling. At the same time, the limited arrows can make You attack strategically with the status of a real archer. Welcome to the gaming world!

Game Features:
A bow, a few arrows, and monster that appeared out of nowhere.
· Kill the target and challenge the shooting record.
·The ultimate VR shooting experience.
·A variety of arrow types with different functions are waiting for you to explore.
·A variety of monster AI, bringing different shooting methods.
·Multiple difficulties and different playing experiences.
·The shooting position is changeable and can be moved freely.

Game operation:
Shooting: Hold down the "trigger button" of the right hand, pull a certain distance from the left hand, aim at the enemy, release the "trigger button" to release the arrow, and shoot the enemy.
Movement: Walk movement or left-hand joystick to control movement.
Switching: The right joystick can switch arrows with different attributes left and right to shoot.

Game goals:
Defend the N waves of attacking monsters to ensure that they will not die and have arrows in their hands, and they will be successful in defense.
